summary:
# Anthropic Pricing Summary

## Overview
This documentation covers pricing for Claude AI products across consumer plans, team/enterprise offerings, and API usage.

## Consumer Plans

### Free Tier ($0)
- Web, iOS, Android, and desktop access
- Code generation and data visualization
- Content writing, editing, and creation
- Text and image analysis
- Web search capability
- Desktop extensions available

### Pro Plan ($17-20/month)
- **$17/month** with annual subscription ($200 billed up front)
- **$20/month** if billed monthly
- Everything in Free, plus:
  - More usage than Free tier
  - Claude Code access (web and terminal)
  - File creation and code execution
  - Unlimited projects for organizing chats/documents
  - Research feature access
  - Google Workspace integration (email, calendar, docs)
  - Remote MCP connector support
  - Extended thinking for complex work
  - Access to more Claude models

### Max Plan (From $100/month)
- Billed monthly, per person
- Everything in Pro, plus:
  - **5x or 20x more usage** than Pro (choice of tiers)
  - Higher output limits for all tasks
  - Memory across conversations
  - Early access to advanced features
  - Priority access during high traffic

---

## Team & Enterprise Plans

### Team Plan - Standard Seat ($25-30/month)
- **$25/month** with annual subscription
- **$30/month** if billed monthly
- **Minimum 5 members required**
- Includes: Chat, projects, and more

### Team Plan - Premium Seat ($150/month)
- **Minimum 5 members required**
- **Includes Claude Code**
- More usage allocation
- Admin controls for remote and local connectors
- Single sign-on (SSO) and domain capture
- Enterprise deployment for Claude desktop app
- Enterprise search across organization
- Microsoft 365, Slack integration
- Central billing and administration
- Early access to collaboration features

### Enterprise Plan (Contact Sales)
- Everything in Team, plus:
  - More usage
  - Enhanced context window
  - Role-based access with fine-grained permissioning
  - SCIM (System for Cross-domain Identity Management)
  - Audit logs
  - Google Docs cataloging
  - Compliance API for observability and monitoring
  - Claude Code (with premium seat)
  - Custom data retention controls

### Education Plan (Contact Sales)
- University-wide plans for students, faculty, and staff
- Discounted rates for all university members
- Academic research and learning mode
- Dedicated API credits
- Educational features for student learning
- Training and enablement resources

---

## API Pricing

### Current Models

| Model | Input | Output | Cache Write | Cache Read |
|-------|-------|--------|-------------|------------|
| **Opus 4.5** | $5/MTok | $25/MTok | $6.25/MTok | $0.50/MTok |
| **Sonnet 4.5** (≤200K) | $3/MTok | $15/MTok | $3.75/MTok | $0.30/MTok |
| **Sonnet 4.5** (>200K) | $6/MTok | $22.50/MTok | $7.50/MTok | $0.60/MTok |
| **Haiku 4.5** | $1/MTok | $5/MTok | $1.25/MTok | $0.10/MTok |

### Legacy Models

| Model | Input | Output | Cache Write | Cache Read |
|-------|-------|--------|-------------|------------|
| **Opus 4.1** | $15/MTok | $75/MTok | $18.75/MTok | $1.50/MTok |
| **Sonnet 4** | $3/MTok | $15/MTok | $3.75/MTok | $0.30/MTok |
| **Opus 4** | $15/MTok | $75/MTok | $18.75/MTok | $1.50/MTok |
| **Sonnet 3.7** | $3/MTok | $15/MTok | $3.75/MTok | $0.30/MTok |
| **Haiku 3.5** | $0.80/MTok | $4/MTok | $1/MTok | $0.08/MTok |
| **Opus 3** | $15/MTok | $75/MTok | $18.75/MTok | $1.50/MTok |
| **Haiku 3** | $0.25/MTok | $1.25/MTok | $0.30/MTok | $0.03/MTok |

### Pricing Tools/Features

| Feature | Cost |
|---------|------|
| **Web Search** | $10 per 1,000 searches (excludes input/output tokens) |
| **Code Execution** | 50 free hours/day per org; $0.05/hour per container after |

---

## Service Tiers
- **Priority**: For time-sensitive workloads requiring availability and predictable pricing
- **Standard**: Default tier for piloting and scaling everyday use cases
- **Batch**: For asynchronous workloads processed together for efficiency

---

## Key Features & Notes

### Batch Processing
- **50% savings** available with batch processing

### Prompt Caching
- Default TTL: **5 minutes**
- Extended prompt caching available (see documentation)

### Claude Code Availability
- Pro plan: Web and terminal access
- Team Premium seat: Included
- Enterprise: Included with premium seat

### Integrations Available
- Google Workspace (Pro+)
- Microsoft 365 (Team+)
- Slack (Team+)
- Remote MCP connectors (Pro+)

---

## Important Caveats
1. **Prices shown don't include applicable tax**
2. **Additional usage limits apply** to various plans
3. **Minimum 5 members required** for Team plans
4. Sonnet 4.5 has **tiered pricing based on prompt length** (≤200K vs >200K tokens)
5. Web search pricing **doesn't include input/output tokens** required to process requests
6. Prompt caching pricing **reflects 5-minute TTL** by default
